SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~acetone and a little camper fuel. And that will take you to the moon.

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Ladies and gentlemen, I, Kleinman the Magician,

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Oh! This was not expected. Umm, let's go to next show!

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Master of the Unexplainable, the Mysterious and the Unknown,
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~掌控离奇神秘与未知的大师，

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Steel, spinning towards my gonads, but I am not afraid!

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~This is a story about my best friend. we met in a truckstop... bathroom.

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Perestroika! Put lips together for Incredible Kleinman!
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~Perestroika！各位可别惊掉了下巴，接下来是不可思议的Kleinman！

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Have you ever been to the moon? All you've got to do is get some household cleaners,
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~你们有去过月球吗？只需要搞点家用清洁剂，

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~cough medicine - that pseudoephedrine or whatever the hell you call it -
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~感冒药－就那个叫伪麻黄碱什么的东西－

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~No man can look death in the face and laugh.
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~直面死亡没有人能放声大笑。

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Laurel, you filthy cretin, put down that whiskey.
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~Laurel，你个又贱又蠢的，把酒放下。

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~And I'll tweak in the afternoon...
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~下午我还会飘飘欲仙...

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Soon I will be quite secure. No man could escape this saw!
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~马上我就会被牢牢绑住。没人能逃脱这把圆锯！

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~And speaking of which, please welcome...my lovely assistant, the lovely Laurel.
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~那么接下来就有请...我美丽的助手，美丽的Laurel。

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Laurel, start the saw. Prepare to be amazed!
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~Laurel，启动圆锯。准备惊叹吧！

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Will blow your mind clean off!

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~He got me all sweaty and I was, like, on the moon.
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~他弄得我全身是汗，而我感觉像是，上了月球。

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Well, yeah...
~z~~x~No, no, no, no, no, no...
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~不，不，不，不，不，不...

SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~浴缸泡药确实爽

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~like a woman with an eeee-ahhh and a zing-zing, if you know what I mean.

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~Aw, aw shit... aw shit, another tooth just gone.

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~No man but me!
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~除我以外再无他人！

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~You know, death be not proud.

SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~但它带不走我！

~z~~x~But I'm just in love with that bathtub meth.

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~She's sexiest junky in Hove Beach. Ms Bluesy St. John!
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~她就是Hove Beach最性感的废人。Bluesy St. John小姐！

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~And hide that gun soon
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~赶紧把枪收起来

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~It takes children, scholars and hobos.
SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~它带走了孩子，学者和流浪汉。

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~The saw of death has claimed many lives over the years.

SHOW6AU.translated: ~z~~x~噢，噢，耶宝贝

SHOW6AU.original: ~z~~x~mix it up in your bathtub with some Iodine, red phosphorus, which is my favorite,
